memory.label: Include a dump of the internal state of the virtual machine (a memory dump) in the snapshot?

vm.label: The virtual machine of which to create a snapshot

name.label: Snapshot name. The name need not be unique for this virtual machine.

description.label: Snapshot description. If omitted, a default description may be provided.

quiesce.label: Use VMware Tools to quiesce the file system in the virtual machine if the virtual machine is powered on when the snapshot is taken?
